unalcol.instance

Class Instance<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • unalcol.instance.Instance<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of objects from which instances will be generated.

    public abstract class Instance<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Instance

    Generates instances of a given Class.

    Source code is available.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.Object create(java.lang.Class<?> type, java.lang.Object... args)
      Generates an instance belonging to the class type according to the parameters (it does not support VarArgs constructors).
      static java.lang.Object create(java.lang.Object owner, java.lang.Class<?> type, java.lang.Object... args)
      Generates an instance belonging to the class type using the Instance generator that is used by owner.
      abstract T get(java.lang.Object... args)
      Creates an instance belonging to the class T.
      static Instance<?> get(java.lang.Object owner, java.lang.Class<?> type)
      Obtains the Instances generator (instances belonging to the class type) that is used by owner.
      static boolean set(java.lang.Object owner, Instance<?> service) 
      abstract java.lang.Class<?> type()
      Obtains the class from which instances are created.

      • get

        public abstract T get(java.lang.Object... args)
        Creates an instance belonging to the class T.
        Parameters:
        args - Arguments for creating an instance.
        Returns:
        An instance belonging to the class T.

      • type

        public abstract java.lang.Class<?> type()
        Obtains the class from which instances are created.
        Returns:
        The class from which instances are created.

      • get

        public static Instance<?> get(java.lang.Object owner,
                              java.lang.Class<?> type)
        Obtains the Instances generator (instances belonging to the class type) that is used by owner.
        Parameters:
        owner - Owner of the Instance generator (instances belonging to the class type)
        type - Class of instances that the Instance generator is generating.
        Returns:
        The Instances generator (instances belonging to the class type) that is used by owner.

      • set

        public static boolean set(java.lang.Object owner,
                          Instance<?> service)
        Parameters:
        owner - Owner that will be associated to the Instance generator (instances belonging to the class type)
        service - Instances generator (instances belonging to the class type) that will be used by owner.
        Returns:
        if the instance service was associated to the owner.

      • create

        public static java.lang.Object create(java.lang.Object owner,
                                      java.lang.Class<?> type,
                                      java.lang.Object... args)
        Generates an instance belonging to the class type using the Instance generator that is used by owner.
        Parameters:
        owner - Owner of the Instance generator (instances belonging to the class type)
        type - Class of instances that will be generated.
        args - Arguments for creating an instance.
        Returns:
        An instance belonging to the class type using the Instance generator that is used by owner.

      • create

        public static java.lang.Object create(java.lang.Class<?> type,
                                      java.lang.Object... args)
        Generates an instance belonging to the class type according to the parameters (it does not support VarArgs constructors).
        Parameters:
        type - Class of instances that will be generated.
        args - Arguments for creating an instance.
        Returns:
        An instance belonging to the class type using the parameters.
